readinglists-db-error-not-set-up: Error message used when trying to perform an operation for a user without calling setup first.
readinglists-db-error-no-projects: Error message used when no projects have been registered for use with the ReadingLists extension.
readinglists-db-error-already-set-up: Error message used when trying to call setup for a user when it has already been performed.
readinglists-db-error-cannot-delete-defa: Error message used when trying to delete the default list.
readinglists-db-error-cannot-update-defa: Error message used when trying to update the default list.
readinglists-db-error-no-such-list: Error message used when trying to do something with a non-existent list.
readinglists-db-error-no-such-list-entry: Error message used when trying to do something with a non-existent list entry.
readinglists-db-error-not-own-list: Error message used when trying to do something with a list that belongs to another user.
readinglists-db-error-not-own-list-entry: Error message used when trying to do something with a list entry that belongs to another user.
readinglists-db-error-list-deleted: Error message used when trying to do something with a list that has been deleted.
readinglists-db-error-list-entry-deleted: Error message used when trying to do something with a list entry that has been deleted.
readinglists-db-error-duplicate-list: Error message used when trying to update a list with a name that's already in use.
readinglists-db-error-duplicate-page: Error message used when trying to add a page to a list that already contains it.
readinglists-db-error-empty-list-ids: Error message used when querying list entries without specifying any lists.
readinglists-db-error-user-required: Error message used when calling a method that operates on a single user, but the user was not specified when the repository object was constructed.
readinglists-db-error-list-limit:
Error message used when the user has as many or more lists than the maximum allowed, and tries to add another one.

Parameters:
* $1 - the maximum allowed number of lists per user.
readinglists-db-error-entry-limit:
Error message used when the user has as many or more entries in the given list than the maximum allowed, and tries to add another one.

Parameters:
* $1 - the ID of the list in question.
$2 - the maximum allowed number of entries per list.
readinglists-db-error-too-long:
Error message used when the user tries to set list/entry string fields to a longer value than what the database schema allows.

Parameters:
* $1 - DB field name.
* $2 - DB field maximum length (in bytes).
readinglists-db-error-no-such-project:
Error message used when the user tries to add a new list entry, but the project does not match any of the known ones.

Parameters:
* $1 - the project.
readinglists-browser-add-entry-success:
Message displayed when the user adds a page to a reading list.

Parameters:
* $1 - Page URL
* $2 - Page name
* $3 - List URL
* $4 - List name
readinglists-browser-remove-entry-succes:
Message displayed when the user removed a page from a reading list.

Parameters:
* $1 - Page URL
* $2 - Page name
* $3 - List URL
* $4 - List name
readinglists-browser-login-prompt: Message prompting the user to log in to save pages to a reading list.
readinglists-browser-error-intro:
Message indicating that an error has occurred

Parameters:
* $1 - The error message from the server.
readinglists-browser-enable-sync-prompt: Message prompting the user to enable reading list syncing in the Wikipedia mobile app.
readinglists-browser-extension-info-link:
Text for a link where the user can learn about the reading lists browser extension
{{Identical|Learn more}}
readinglists-browser-list-entry-limit-ex:
Message informing the user that a page cannot be added to a list because the list has reached its maximum number of entries.

Parameters:
* $1 - The maximum number of entries per list.
readinglists-browser-extension-product-t: Name of the browser extension for adding wiki pages to a reading list
readinglists-browser-page-not-supported:
Tooltip shown when the user hovers over the browser extension's toolbar icon on an unsupported page.

Parameters:
* $1 - The extension name.
readinglists-special-title: Title of special page that shows reading lists. A plural adjective that describes pages.
readinglists-special-title-imported: Shown for users importing a list
readinglists-description: Summary of page that shows all your reading lists
reading-list-purpose: Prompt telling user why they should login.
reading-list-purpose-for-temp-user: Prompt telling the user of a temporary account that they need to get a named account to have private reading lists.
readinglists-import-error: Error that shows when you try to import bad data.
readinglists-import-size-error: Error that shows on large lists.
special-tab-readinglists-short: Tab that shows on special page to take you back to your lists
readinglists-title: Title that appears on the Special:ReadingLists page.
readinglists-total-lists:
Message that shows the total number of reading lists a user created.

Parameters:
* $1 - Lists count
readinglists-total-articles:
Message that shows the total number of articles in a reading list.

Parameters:
* $1 - Articles count
readinglists-selected-articles:
Displays the number of articles selected out of the total count.

Parameters:
* $1 - Selected articles count
* $2 - Total articles count
readinglists-select-article: Checkbox label for selecting an article in edit mode.
readinglists-remove-title: Dialog title that is shown after clicking the Remove button.
readinglists-remove-confirmation:
Dialog message that is shown after clicking the Remove button.

Parameters:
* $1 - Removed articles count
* $2 - List name
readinglists-remove-success:
Message displayed when the user removed one or more articles from a reading list.

Parameters:
* $1 - Removed articles count
* $2 - List URL
* $3 - List name
readinglists-show-more: Show more button label for Special:ReadingLists.
readinglists-empty-title: Title that shows on a list with no articles in it.
readinglists-empty-cta: Call to action that shows on a list with no articles in it.
readinglists-empty-random: Random button text that shows on a list with no articles in it.
readinglists-display-menu: Display button label for screen readers.
readinglists-display-sort: Header for "Sort by" in the display menu.
readinglists-display-sort-name: Option for "sort: name" in the display menu.
readinglists-display-sort-updated: Option for "sport: updated" in the display menu.
readinglists-display-direction: Header for "Direction" in the display menu.
readinglists-display-direction-ascending: Option for "direction: ascending" in the display menu.
readinglists-display-direction-descendin: Option for "direction: descending" in the display menu.
readinglists-display-view: Header for "View as" in the display menu.
readinglists-display-view-grid: Option for "view: grid" in the display menu.
readinglists-display-view-compact: Option for "view: compact" in the display menu.
readinglists-edit-button: Edit button label for screen readers.
action-action-readinglist-private:
Security error when you try and access someone's user list

{{Doc-action}}
readinglists-empty-message: Message that shows when you have zero lists.
readinglists-import-empty-message: Shown on tab of lists of lists when importing.
readinglists-list-empty-message: Message that shows on a list with no pages in it.
readinglists-no-title: Name of a list without a name
readinglists-watchlist: An item in the list of reading lists.
readinglists-watchlist-monitor: Wikitext that contains a link to the watchlist tool.
readinglists-import-app-misconfigured: Shows when something is setup incorrectly and the import URL is followed.
readinglists-import-disclaimer: Explains how the list was generated.
readinglists-import-button-label:
Button label for importing the current list.
{{identical|Import}}
readinglists-import-button-hint: Hint shown above the button for importing the current list.
readinglists-share-url-text:
Text that will be shared to clipboard. Parameters:
* $1 list title
* $2 list description
* $3 URL of list (optional)
readinglists-share-url-text-incomplete:
Text that will be shared to clipboard. Description is missing. Parameters:
* $1 list title
* $2 URL of list (optional)
readinglists-share-url-notify: Notifies user that something has been copied to clipboard.
readinglists-import-app-launch-hint: Hint shown when attempting to import a list without the app installed.
readinglists-beta-feature-name: Name of beta feature. Shown on preferences beta section when the reading list feature is enabled on beta.
readinglists-beta-feature-description: Description of beta feature. Shown on preferences beta section when the reading list feature is enabled on beta.
readinglists-menu-item: Menu item added to both mobile and desktop site
readinglists-add-bookmark: Button label for adding a page bookmark
readinglists-remove-bookmark: Button label for removing a page bookmark
